room_title: Escape room "The Collection" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
room_description: Horace von Crump, world traveler and collector of mystical & bizarre artifacts, has an uninvited guest inhabiting his private collection. Simply put, von Crump has a poltergeist. To protect his curious display, he’s opened his estate to the public, and has requested help from the most clever & brave. So…are you clever? Brave? Can you find the haunted relic and purge the room of the poltergeist? Or, will you lose your mind to the ghostly shenanigans?
